workflow.description: Provides multi-level PO approval logic for POs entered in all roles
workflow.name: *VR - Multi-Level Purchase Approval

workflowstate.description:
1) Set PO field 'Employee' to the Current User 2) Set PO Approval Status to 'Pending Approval' 3) Set 'Next Approver' to the Employee by default 4) Set 'Next Approver' to the Employee's 'Purchase Approver' - IF - Employee's 'Purchase Limit' < PO Total
Transition to 'Pending Approval' state if 'Next Approver' is NOT Employee Transition to 'Approval Not Required' state if 'Next Approver' IS Employee
workflowstate.name: Entry

sendemailaction.body:
You have a new employee purchase request from 
{employee.entityid} to approve. You can log in to 
http://www.netsuite.com to approve.
sendemailaction.subject: New Purchase Order To Approve

workflowstate.description:
No Approval Required
NOTES a) Send Email action Sender changed to Employee instead of Requestor b) Send Email action moved to EXIT from Entry because failure prevents all ENTRY actions from executing causing the message to move to Pending Approval when it should not c) Send Email action moved to afterSubmit from EXIT to prevent BEFORE LOAD errors and for logic d) Changed transition to Pending Approval to fire on After Submit instead of nothing. e) Removed the action that sets Next Approver to empty on exit. This stranded POs that later required approval.
workflowstate.name: No Approval Required

sendemailaction.body: A new PO requires your approval.
sendemailaction.subject: PO Requires Your Approval

workflowstate.description: Adds Approve/Reject buttons for Next Approver Moves to Approved if Total within employee's purchase limit Moves to Approved if Total >= the Next Approver's Purchase Approval Limit AND the Approve button is clicked Moves to Next Approver if Total < the Next Approver's Purchase Approval Limit AND the Approve button is clicked Move to Rejected if anyone clicks Reject
workflowstate.name: Pending Approval

initcondition.formula: "User" IN ("Next Approver") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1") OR "User" IN ("Workflow:Next Approver's Approver")
"User" IN ("Next Approver") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1") OR "User" IN ("Workflow:Next Approver's Approver")

workflowstate.description: Sets the Next Approver field value to the current Next Approver's Purchase Approver. This allows it to climb the ladder of the purchasing approval hierarchy.
workflowstate.name: Next Approver

sendemailaction.body:
You have a new employee purchase request from 
{employee.entityid} to approve. You can log in to 
http://www.netsuite.com to approve.
sendemailaction.subject: New Purchase Order To Approve

sendemailaction.body: {nextapprover} has approved your Purchase Request.
sendemailaction.subject: Your Purchase Request Has Been Approved

sendemailaction.body: Your Purchase Request {transactionnumber} Has Been Rejected.
sendemailaction.subject: Your Purchase Request Has Been Rejected

sendemailaction.body: This transaction amount has changed on an approved transaction. Re-Approval is now required.
sendemailaction.subject: New Purchase Order To Re-Approve

sendemailaction.body:
You have a new employee purchase request from 
{employee.entityid} to approve. You can log in to 
http://www.netsuite.com to approve.
sendemailaction.subject: New Purchase Order To Approve
